title.native: ベルゼブブ嬢のお気に召すまま。

description:
Murin's lands his dream job with the demon king he's always held in awe, but when his tenure begins, it turns out the demon king isn't quite what he expected...

(Source: Yen Press)

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Work
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a certain occupation.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Afterlife
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the afterlife.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Angels
tags.description: Prominently features spiritual beings usually represented with wings and halos and believed to be attendants of God.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

title.native: ベルゼブブ嬢のお気に召すまま。

node.description:
[Official Site](https://www.phantasia.jp/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/3pasiofficial/) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/5WmX340gDNLIAyUcg4MzWN) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/3_phantasia) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4lk0Ob-F3ptOQUUq8s0pzQ)

Sangatsu no Phantasia is a Japanese music unit which is signed to Sacra Music. It consists of vocalist [Mia](https://anilist.co/staff/272155/Mia), whose music videos and promotional images are illustrated by various artists. The unit began activities in 2015 when it uploaded its first song "Day Break" on YouTube, before making its major debut in 2016. In addition to producing music, Mia also writes novels, with some of the unit's songs being based on her novels.

**Members:** 

- Vocals: [Mia](https://anilist.co/staff/272155/Mia)
- Composer: [Scop](https://twitter.com/scopscop)
- Illustrator: [Natsu Asami](https://twitter.com/72desuyo)
- Composer: [n-buna](https://twitter.com/nabuna2)
- Composer: [Yuuyu](https://twitter.com/yuuyu_ssry)
- Composer: [40mp](https://twitter.com/40mP)
- Composer: [buzz-G](https://twitter.com/buzz_g)

__Height:__ 156 cm
__Agency:__ I'm Enterprise

[Profile](https://www.imenterprise.jp/profile.php?id=29) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/onishi_saori86/)


**Non anime roles:**
- Sena Himuro - Blue Archive (Video Game)
- Ruan Mei - Honkai: Star Rail (Video Game)
- Dana - Ys VIII Lacrimosa of Dana (Video Game)

__Height:__ 150 cm
__Agency:__ Office Osawa

She is affiliated to talent agency Office Osawa.

[Profile (Office Osawa)](https://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/kunomisaki/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kuno_misaki0119)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Klee - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Mirabilis - Fire Emblem Heroes (VG)
- Cocoa - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Achates - Epic 7 (VG)

__[Website](http://www.naotyu-studio7.com/)__ | __[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/chiba0413)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/naotyu_ch)__

__Birthplace:__ Sapporo, Hokkaido Prefecture, Japan

__Naoki Chiba__, also known as naotyu- is a Japanese composer, arranger, lyricist and producer. He is affiliated with Sony Music Publishing.

__Height:__ 164 cm

[Website](https://mausu.net/talent/kakuma-ai.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aimausu)

**Non-Anime Roles:**
~!- Amber Butterfly - Kemono Friends (VG)
- Amour - Memento Mori (VG)
- Chloe - Criminal Girls 2 (VG)
- Concetta - Fate/Grand Order: Edmond Dantes (Drama CD)
- Edelgard von Hresvelg - Fire Emblem Three Houses (VG)
- El_Clear - Muse Dash (VG)

- Hikari Tominaga - White Day: A Labyrinth Named School (VG)
- Ion - Ar nosurge ~Umare Izuru Hoshi no Inoru Uta~ (VG)
- Ion - Ciel nosurge ~Ushinawareta Hoshi e Sasagu Uta~ (VG)
- La Coiffe - Granblue Fantasy (VG)

- Laplace - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Ludmilla - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

- Rulutieh - Utawarerumono: Itsuwari no Kamen (VG)
- Rurutie - Azur Lane (VG)
- Ryu - Hero Must Die (VG)
- Sarasa Morikawa - Blue Reflection: Maboroshi ni Mau - Shoujo no Ken (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/88151202)

Nobuhiro Nakayama is a producer belonging to [Aniplex](https://anilist.co/studio/17/). Formerly [Geneon Universal Entertainment](https://anilist.co/studio/31/), then [Warner Bros.](https://anilist.co/studio/415/)
